description.en:
Course is designed for students who have previously studied Russian and reached the level A2.

The topics of the course:

My relatives and my friends,
My biography: what year, month, day,
Character and appearance,
Moving around the town,
I like to travel.

The course covers following grammatical areas: verb aspect, numerals, verbs of motion and their prefixes, adverbs of place, all cases in singular and plural.
description.et:
Kursus on mõeldud üliõpilastele, kes on õppinud vene keelt vähemalt ühe aasta.
Kursuse teemad:
Minu sugulased ja minu sõbrad.
Minu elulugu: aastad ja kuupäevad. 
Inimese iseloom ja välimus.
Liikumine linnas.
Armastan reisida.

Grammatika põhiteemad: verbi aspektipaarid, aja- ja ruumiväljendid, järgarvsõnad ja aastaarvud, liikumist väljendavad tegusõnad, kohamäärsõnad, käänete uued tähendused.

objectives.en: The course aims at enlarging and enhancing the knowledge and skills acquired at the previous level. The course covers the listening, reading and translating of texts, conversations, discussions and work with vocabulary and grammar structures for coping with various communication situations.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on edasi arendada algajate tasemel omandatud teadmisi ja oskuseid läbi erinevate keelesituatsioonide. Kursuse käigus laiendatakse lugemis-, kuulamis-, kirjutamis- ja suhtlusoskuseid. Kursusel käsitletakse erinevaid kuulamis-, lugemis- ja tõlketekste, arendatakse suhtlemist, diskussioonioskust ning tehakse tööd sõnavara ja grammatika vallas, et hakkama saada igapäevastes suhtlussituatsioonides.

description.et: 1-2 Course introduction. Getting acquainted. Greetings and saying good-bye. Family: words and expressions. Russian names and their forms. Grammar revision: Imperfective/Perfective verb aspects. All cases.
3-4 My relatives and my friends. Telling the date: in what year, month, day. Biography. Grammar: Gen. plural. Prep. sing. Inst. sing.&pl. Ordinal numerals.
5-7 Describing personality: character and appearance. Clothing, jewellery. Grammar: All cases - sing.&pl. Imperfective/Perfective verb aspects.
8-10 In the city: places and activities. Moving around the town. Asking and explaining the route. Grammar: Prep., Gen., Acc. cases. Verbs of motion without/with prefixes.
11-12 Traveling. Asking and telling the time (special forms). Staying at the hotel. Grammar: All cases, verbs of motion, verb aspects.
